root.name: Beverly Hills Cop
root.description: Advertising CopyJoin Axel Foley as he makes his long-awaited return in this thrilling all-new action adventure, based on the Beverly Hills Cop movie from Paramount Pictures! Have you got what it takes to survive on the mean streets of Los Angeles?6 HUGE MISSIONS! - Bust villains across the City of Angels, from the penthouses to the pavements!6 UNIQUE WEAPONS! - Fight crime with an awesome armoury of weapons, from assault rifles to sub-machine guns!SHOOT FAST, TALK FASTER! - Use your wits to wise-crack your way out of tight spots just like Axel!Reception"This is the 9/11 of video games." - Jeff Gerstmann, Giant Bomb
